definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Live turkeys, pure-bred breeding animals, weighing not more than 185 g.
sentences.chinese: 火雞，純種繁殖用，重量185公克及以下者。

sentences.english: The kilogram of grapes I bought this morning was a few grams short.
sentences.chinese: 我早上買的一公斤的葡萄少了好幾公克。

sentences.english: Live turkeys, other than pure-bred breeding animals, weighing not more than 185 g.
sentences.chinese: 火雞，純種繁殖用除外，重量185公克及以下者。

sentences.english: Divide it into 20 grams per piece .

definition: to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
twenty-fourth part of a tael (2 or 3 grams)
